snippet: Borrowing can be very good policy, allowing the government to provide Americans a higher quality of life. But deficits can have multiple downsides.
abstract: Borrowing can be very good policy, allowing the government to provide Americans a higher quality of life. But deficits can have multiple downsides.
lead_paragraph: It takes only two lines to explain the federal government’s financial situation. The first shows federal spending, measured as a share of the nation’s economic output. The second shows federal revenues. And the space in between — that’s the deficit.
